verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
To be in Your presence
To sit at Your feet,
Where Your love surrounds me,
And makes me complete.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
This is my desire, O Lord,
This is my desire.
This is my desire, O Lord,
This is my desire.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
To rest in Your presence,
Not rushing away;
To treasure each moment,
Here I would stay.
